name: Leprechaun
skills: Deception +5, Perception +6, Persuasion +5, Sleight of Hand +5, Stealth +7
resistance: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The leprechaun’s innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: dancing lights, hideous laughter, invisibility (self only), mage hand, magic mouth, major image, minor illusion * 1/day each: hypnotic pattern, major image

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/turn)
traits.desc: The leprechaun deals an extra 3 (1d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the leprechaun that isn’t incapacitated and the leprechaun doesn’t have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
